content: this is a free pattern on my blog i don t know about you but the start of a new season always has me itching to create spring themed amigurumi these little chicks are the perfect addition to any collection and they re super cute and fun to crochet these are so quick to make and the pattern includes step by step photos to help you along the way pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size e/3 5mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins optional- 16 gauge black wire for the glasses skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain half_double_crochet double_crochet finished measurement 2 5 inches wide and 3 inches tall
